description.narrative: 200000501: Op/Fin Closed on 21 Dec 2017 2000003180: IRA/PHA/74/INV/220 -- At the 62nd Meeting, UNDP as the lead implementing agency submitted for Executive Committee the HCFC phase-out management plan (HPMP) together with the following three sub-sector plans:(a) Sector plan for foam (Germany and UNIDO);(b) Sector plan for HCFC phase-out in air-conditioning sector (UNDP);(c) Sector plan for HCFC phase-out in refrigeration servicing sector For achieving Stage I phase-out targets, Iran proposes to implement HCFC phase-out project in identified enterprises in rigid foam including continuous and discontinuous sandwich panels, integral skin foam, systems houses and domestic air-conditioning applications. In addition, activities relating to regulations enforcement strengthening and service sector training are proposed to be implemented during Stage I to have more effective controlling and monitoring of HCFC supply and reducing HCFC consumption in servicing applications. HPMP Stage I has the objective to phase out 35 % of the ODS (consumption of HCFCs) in Iran by 2020.
